alert.note: Alert for Lapeer (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 9:56PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN LAPEER COUNTY THROUGH 1100 PM EDT... At 955 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Otisville to near Columbiaville to near Davison. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lapeer, North Branch, Columbiaville, Otter Lake, Clifford, Burnside, Elba, and Kings Mill. This includes I-69 between mile markers 149 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
